title: Triple for Moto 360
summary: First Android Wear game specifically design for round displays.
description: Addictive match-3 game : swipe the tiles to match three or more tiles of same color.This game was design specifically for round displays : the topology of the board participate to the strategy of the game.Of course you can play on squared-shaped watches too.More over you can play both on watch and smartphone, the game is synchronized for each move.Enjoy the smooth animation while dragging the tiles. Get 1 point when matching 3 tiles, 2 points if 4 tiles get matched, etc. On the watch, double-tap to display the score and long-press to exit.
descriptionHTML:
Addictive match-3 game : swipe the tiles to match three or more tiles of same color.

This game was design specifically for round displays : the topology of the board participate to the strategy of the game.
Of course you can play on squared-shaped watches too.
More over you can play both on watch and smartphone, the game is synchronized for each move.

Enjoy the smooth animation while dragging the tiles. Get 1 point when matching 3 tiles, 2 points if 4 tiles get matched, etc. On the watch, double-tap to display the score and long-press to exit.
comments: Battery drain. Installed this and my 360 battery drains 50% over 2 hours.  Even rebooted watch and it still drained.  Only difference was installing this app.
Ok Both on watch and phone
Nice Nice game on the watch.
